author: nikmagini
body:
Includes the following changes:
- updated webtools version (completed futurize stage1, and a few minor fixes)
- phedex-web daemon fixed in code instead of spec file
- use separate parameter for graphtools connection id in config, to use read-only connections in DBGraph secrets file
- fixed support links

Tested on new arch on private VM phedex-web-magini.cern.ch
title: Increase PHEDEX-web to 4.2.15 for HG1602
